title: Question about report warnings
body: So I haven't received a warning in quite a long that "my behavior has been out of line and we all have bad days". Does this mean reports against me have gone down a lot or do people not always get warnings?

replies.body: You get the warning if you have been reported more than typical (over multiple games) recently, whether those reports are actually valid or not. If you are not getting the warning than you are not being reported an unusually high amount of times.
